entries.abort: You just made our day, buddy. Good luck explaining this one.
entries.angry_disable: Do you think that it will be this easy? You had better run now before our allies show up and destroy you.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Tracking stolen transport. Stand by for the navigation location.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Stolen shuttle located. Disable, capture, and return that transport to Imperial hands.
entries.capture_complete: Transport is back under Imperial control. Preparing for departure.
entries.capture_phase_1: Systems shut down. Attempting to reboot now.
entries.capture_phase_2: Systems coming back online. We will follow you, just don't destroy us.
entries.complete: Transport has been returned to Imperial space.
entries.failed_destroy: The Inquisition requested that ship personally. You had better have a good explaination ready. Report back.
entries.failed_escape: The Inquisition requested that ship personally. You had better have a good explaination ready. Report back.
entries.panic_1: They are going to destroy us rather then let us be captured.
entries.panic_2: I would rather die then be turned over to the Inquisition.
entries.panic_4: They will never let us be captured alive.
entries.panic_5: For the Rebellion I give my life.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable the transport's engines.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow and protect the transport until it can make the jump back to Endor and the Inquisitor.
entries.quest_location_d: The last transport is in the Dantooine system. Capture it before the Bothans can move it out of the system.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the transport is disabled, move in close and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.recovery_success: Nice flying out there, pilot. We have the transport and the agent is most ancious to question those Bothans.
entries.split_quest_alert: Rebel Command Vessels located. Destroy all enemy vessels.
entries.target_disabled: The shuttles engines are down. Being docking procedures.
entries.taunt_2: You are out of your league, Imperial dog.
entries.taunt_3: We will retake the transport, and destroy you in the process.
entries.taunt_4: If you want that transport you are going to have to come through me first.
entries.thanks_1: Have a heart, let me die with honor.
entries.thanks_3: Many have fallen, but the tyranny of the Empire will never win.
entries.thanks_4: One day, I shall have my revenge on you.
entries.thanks_5: Have a heart, let me die with honor.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Capture the Stolen Engineer Transport
entries.title_d: The Inquisitor wants the Bothan spies sent back to him so he can question them about their operation. We have located the third and final missing transport inside the Dantooine system. You are to capture it and send it back to Endor.
